00111                 protected function initialize()
00112                 {
00113                         $classname = get_class($this);
00114                         $this->name = strtolower(substr($classname, 0, strpos($classname, "Controller")));
00115                         if (isset($_REQUEST['action']) && !empty($_REQUEST['action']))
00116                         {
00117                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $_REQUEST['action'])))
00118                                 {
00119                                         $this->action = $_REQUEST['action'];
00120                                 }
00121                                 else
00122                                 {
00123                                         $this->unknown_action();
00124                                 }
00125                         }
00126                         else
00127                         {
00128                                 $this->action = 'index';
00129                         }
00130                                 
00131                         $this->title = "EmeRails";
00132                 }

00180                 protected function before_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00181                 {
00182                         if (is_array($filter))
00183                         {
00184                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00185                                 {
00186                                         $this->before_filter($f, $params);
00187                                 }
00188                                 return;
00189                         }
00190                         $this->before_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00191                 }
00192 
00223                 protected function after_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00224                 {
00225                         if (is_array($filter))
00226                         {
00227                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00228                                 {
00229                                         $this->after_filter($f, $params);
00230                                 }
00231                                 return;
00232                         }
00233                         $this->after_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00234                 }
00235 
00245                 private function filter_applicable($conditions)
00246                 {                       
00247                         if (is_array($conditions))
00248                         {
00249                                 // If an 'except' key exists, check that the action is not included
00250                                 if (array_key_exists('except', $conditions))
00251                                 {
00252                                         $except = $conditions['except'];
00253                                         if (is_array($except))
00254                                         {
00255                                                 return !in_array($this->action, $except);
00256                                         }
00257                                         else if ($except != $this->action)
00258                                         {
00259                                                 return TRUE;
00260                                         }
00261                                 }
00262                                 // If an 'only' key exists, check that the action is included
00263                                 else if (array_key_exists('only', $conditions))
00264                                 {
00265                                         $only = $conditions['only'];
00266                                         if (is_array($only))
00267                                         {
00268                                                 return in_array($this->action, $only);
00269                                         }
00270                                         else if ($only == $this->action)
00271                                         {
00272                                                 return TRUE;
00273                                         }
00274                                 }
00275                                 return FALSE;
00276                         }
00277                         return TRUE;
00278                 }

00301                         $this->pages_cached[] = $page;

00347                 protected function cached_page_filename()
00348                 {
00349                         $lang = isset($_COOKIE['hl']) ? $_COOKIE['hl'] : 'en';
00350                         $id = isset($_REQUEST['id']) ? "@{$_REQUEST['id']}" : '';
00351                         $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../caches/{$this->name}/{$this->action}{$id}-{$lang}.cached";
00352                         return $cachefile;
00353                 }

00361                 protected function expire_cached_page($params)
00362                 {
00363                         $controller = isset($params['controller']) ? $params['controller'] : $this->name;
00364                         $action = isset($params['action']) ? $params['action'] : $this->action;
00365                         $id = isset($params['id']) ? "@{$params['id']}" : '';
00366                         
00367                         $langs = Localization::$languages;
00368                         
00369                         foreach ($langs as $lang)
00370                         {
00371                                 $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../caches/{$controller}/{$action}{$id}-{$lang}.cached";
00372                                 @unlink($cachefile);
00373                         }
00374                 }

00389                 protected function redirect_to($params)
00390                 {
00391                         if (is_array($params))
00392                         {
00393                                 $URL = sprintf("http://%s%s%s",
00394                                         $_SERVER["HTTP_HOST"],
00395                                         $this->url_to($params),
00396                                         isset($params['query_string']) && !empty($params['query_string']) ? "?{$params['query_string']}" : '');
00397                                 if (!isset($params['after']))
00398                                 {
00399                                         $this->response->add_header("Location", $URL);
00400                                         $this->response->flush();
00401                                 }
00402                                 else
00403                                 {
00404                                         $this->response->add_header("Refresh", "{$params['after']};url={$URL}");
00405                                 }
00406                         }
00407                         else
00408                         {
00409                                 $this->response->add_header("Location", $params);
00410                                 $this->response->flush();
00411                         }
00412                 }

00424                 protected function redirect_to_referrer($or_else = NULL)
00425                 {
00426                         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']))
00427                         {
00428                                 $this->redirect_to($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']);
00429                         }
00430                         else if (!empty($or_else))
00431                         {
00432                                 $this->redirect_to($or_else);
00433                         }
00434                 }

00452                 public function link_to($text, $params = array())
00453                 {
00454                         $params['href'] = isset($params['href']) ?
00455                                 $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00456                         
00457                         unset($params['action']);
00458                         unset($params['controller']);
00459                         unset($params['id']);
00460                         unset($params['query_string']);
00461                         
00462                         print a($text, $params);
00463                 }

00478                 public function link_to_remote($text, $params = array())
00479                 {
00480                         $params['href'] = !empty($params['href']) ? $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00481                         $params['remote_url'] = !empty($params['remote_url']) ? $params['remote_url'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00482                         // Ajax magic
00483                         $params['onclick'] = "$('#{$params['target']}').html('<div class=\"loading\"><span>" . l('Loading...') . "</span></div>').load('{$params['remote_url']}'); return false";
00484                         
00485                         unset($params['action']);
00486                         unset($params['controller']);
00487                         unset($params['id']);
00488                         unset($params['target']);
00489                         unset($params['remote_url']);
00490                         
00491                         print a($text, $params);
00492                 }

00546                 function url_to_myself($relative = TRUE)
00547                 {
00548                         $url = $this->url_to(array('action' => $this->action, 'type' => $this->type, 'id' => @$_REQUEST['id']));
00549                         return $relative ?
00550                                 $url :
00551                                 sprintf('http://%s%s',
00552                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00553                                         $url);

00572                 public function make_relative_url($params)
00573                 {
00574                         $controller = (!isset($params['controller']) || empty($params['controller'])) ?
00575                                 $this->name : $params['controller'];
00576                         $type = (isset($params['type']) && !empty($params['type'])) ?
00577                                 $params['type'] : 'html';
00578                         if (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action']))
00579                         {
00580                                 if (isset($params['id']) && !empty($params['id']))
00581                                 {
00582                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s/%s',
00583                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00584                                                 $controller,
00585                                                 $params['action'],
00586                                                 $params['id']);
00587                                 }
00588                                 else
00589                                 {
00590                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s.%s',
00591                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00592                                                 $controller,
00593                                                 $params['action'],
00594                                                 $type);                                 
00595                                 }
00596                         }
00597                         else
00598                         {
00599                                 $href = sprintf('%s%s/index.%s',
00600                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00601                                         $controller,
00602                                         $type);                         
00603                         }
00604                         if (isset($params['query_string']))
00605                         {
00606                                 $href .= "?{$params['query_string']}";
00607                         }
00608                         if (isset($params['hash']))
00609                         {
00610                                 $href .= "#{$params['hash']}";
00611                         }
00612                         return $href;
00613                 }

00638                 public function render($params)
00639                 {
00640                         if ($this->rendered)
00641                         {
00642                                 return;
00643                         }
00644                         // Initialize rendered content
00645                         $rendered = NULL;
00646                         if ($params === NULL)
00647                         {
00648                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00649                         }
00650                         else if (isset($params['partial']))
00651                         {
00652                                 // Get part file
00653                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/{$this->name}/_{$params['partial']}.php";
00654                                 
00655                                 // Connect main object
00656                                 if (isset($params['object']))
00657                                 {
00658                                         eval("\${$params['partial']} = \$params['object'];");
00659                                 }
00660                                 else
00661                                 {
00662                                         eval("if (isset(\$this->{$params['partial']})) \${$params['partial']} = \$this->{$params['partial']};");
00663                                 }
00664                                 
00665                                 // Start output buffering
00666                                 ob_start();
00667                                 
00668                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00669                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00670                         
00671                                 // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00672                                 $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00673                         }
00674                         else
00675                         {
00676                                 // Get action to render
00677                                 $action = (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action'])) ? 
00678                                         $params['action'] : $this->action;
00679                                         
00680                                 // Get part file
00681                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/{$this->name}/{$action}.php";
00682                                 
00683                                 // Start output buffering
00684                                 ob_start();
00685                                 
00686                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00687                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00688                                 
00689                                 // Get buffer contents
00690                                 $this->content_for_layout = ob_get_contents();
00691                                 // Backwards compatibility
00692                                 $this->page_content = $this->content_for_layout;
00693                                 
00694                                 // Clean output buffer
00695                                 ob_end_clean();
00696                                 
00697                                 if (isset($params['layout']) && $params['layout'] == FALSE ||
00698                                         isset($_REQUEST['nolayout']))
00699                                 {
00700                                         // Do not print layout
00701                                         $rendered = $this->content_for_layout;
00702                                 }
00703                                 else
00704                                 {
00705                                         $rendered = $this->render_layout($params);
00706                                 }
00707                                 
00708                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00709                         }
00710                         
00711                         if (isset($params['return']))
00712                         {
00713                                 return $rendered;
00714                         }
00715                         else
00716                         {
00717                                 print $rendered;
00718                         }
00719                 }

00730                 public function render_as_string($params)
00731                 {
00732                         $params['return'] = TRUE;
00733                         return $this->render($params);

00746                 protected function render_layout($params)
00747                 {
00748                         $layout = isset($params['layout']) && !empty($params['layout']) ?
00749                                 $params['layout'] : $this->name;
00750                                 
00751                         // Initialize rendered content
00752                         $rendered = NULL;
00753                         
00754                         // Start output buffering
00755                         ob_start();
00756                         
00757                         // Get part file
00758                         $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/layouts/{$layout}_layout.php";
00759                         if (!file_exists($partfile))
00760                         {
00761                                 // Fall back to default layout
00762                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/layouts/default_layout.php";
00763                         }
00764                         
00765                         // Evaluate and send to buffer
00766                         print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00767                 
00768                         // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00769                         $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00770                         
00771                         return $rendered;
00772                 }
00773 
00786                 public function render_page()
00787                 {
00788                         // Process before filters queue
00789                         foreach ($this->before_filters as $before_filter)
00790                         {
00791                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($before_filter[1]))
00792                                 {
00793                                         $filter = $before_filter[0];
00794                                         $this->$filter();
00795                                 }
00796                         }
00797 
00798                         // If the page should be cached, verify if it exists in the cache
00799                         if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached) &&
00800                                         $this->cached_page_exists())
00801                         {
00802                                 $cached_file = $this->cached_page_filename();
00803                                 if (isset($this->mimetype))
00804                                 {
00805                                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00806                                 }
00807                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Length', filesize($cached_file));
00808                                 $this->response->body .= file_get_contents($cached_file);
00809                         }
00810                         else
00811                         {                       
00812                                 // Start buffering
00813                                 ob_start();
00814                         
00815                                 // Call eventual controller action
00816                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $this->action)))
00817                                 {
00818                                         $this->{$this->action}();
00819                                 }
00820                                 else
00821                                 {
00822                                         HTTP::error(500);
00823                                 }
00824                                 // Call render on the controller
00825                                 // This won't have effect if the controller has already rendered
00826                                 $this->render($_REQUEST);
00827 
00828                                 // Get response body, clean output buffer
00829                                 $this->response->body .= ob_get_clean();
00830                                 
00831                                 // Conversely, if the page should be cached, store it in cache
00832                                 if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached))
00833                                 {
00834                                         $caches_dir = dirname($this->cached_page_filename());
00835                                         if (!file_exists($caches_dir))
00836                                         {
00837                                                 mkdir($caches_dir, 0700);
00838                                         }
00839                                         file_put_contents($this->cached_page_filename(), $this->response->body);
00840                                 }
00841                         }
00842                         
00843                         // Process after filters queue
00844                         foreach ($this->after_filters as $after_filter)
00845                         {
00846                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($after_filter[1]))
00847                                 {
00848                                         $filter = $after_filter[0];
00849                                         $this->$filter();
00850                                 }
00851                         }
00852                         
00853                         if (isset($this->mimetype))
00854                         {
00855                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00856                         }
00857                         
00858                         // Finally, flush responses
00859                         $this->response->flush();
00860                 }
00861 
00874                 public function render_component($params)
00875                 {
00876                         // Merge request and user parameters
00877                         $_GET = array_merge($_GET, $params);
00878                         
00879                         // If a controller is not set, use current controller
00880                         if (!isset($params['controller']))
00881                         {
00882                                 $classname = $this->name;
00883                         }
00884                         else
00885                         {
00886                                 // FIXME: table_name_to_class_name is not the right function to use here!
00887                                 $classname = table_name_to_class_name($params['controller']);
00888                                 require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../controllers/{$params['controller']}_controller.php");
00889                                 
00890                                 // Load localization table
00891                                 Localization::add_strings_table($params['controller']);
00892                         }
00893                         
00894                         // Instantiate controller
00895                         $controller = eval("return new {$classname}Controller();");
00896                         
00897                         // Unset controller key from params (why?)
00898                         unset($params['controller']);
00899                         
00900                         // Set requested action
00901                         if (isset($params['action']))
00902                         {
00903                                 $controller->action = $params['action'];
00904                         }
00905                         
00906                         // Invoke action method
00907                         eval("\$controller->{$params['action']}();");
00908                         
00909                         // Request rendering with no layout
00910                         $params['layout'] = FALSE;
00911                         
00912                         // Note that this could already have been called
00913                         $controller->render($params);
00914                 }
00915 
00923                 protected function load_part_contents($filename)
00924                 {
00925                         if (!file_exists($filename))
00926                         {
00927                                 HTTP::error(500);
00928                         }
00929                         $contents = file_get_contents($filename);
00930                         return $this->strip_external_php_tags($contents);
00931                 }
00932 
00940                 protected function strip_external_php_tags($php_code)
00941                 {
00942                         if (($start = strpos($php_code, "<?php")) === 0)
00943                         {
00944                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, $start + strlen("<?php"));
00945                         }
00946                         else
00947                         {
00948                                 $php_code = "?>\n" . $php_code;
00949                         }
00950                         if (($end = strrpos($php_code, "?>")) === strlen($php_code) - strlen("?>"))
00951                         {
00952                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, 0, strrpos($php_code, "?>"));
00953                         }
00954                         else
00955                         {
00956                                 $php_code = $php_code . "\n<?php\n";
00957                         }
00958                         return $php_code;
00959                 }

01027                 protected function compress()
01028                 {
01029                         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING']) &&
01030                                 preg_match("/(x-gzip|gzip)/", $_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING'], $matches))
01031                         {
01032                                 $this->response->body = gzencode($this->response->body, 9);
01033                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Encoding', $matches[1]);
01034                         }
01035                 }
01036         }
